Package Model

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    BeastRiderUnit  
    BoardModel
    This class represends the Board of the game, and it will hold all the Units that are in the game until they die in which case the Player class takes hold of the defeated Units The Class is also responsible to populate the Board with the Units and also remove units.
    DragonUnit  
    DwarfUnit  
    ElfUnit  
    FlagUnit  
    ImmovableUnit
    This Class separates the Immovable Units from the rest of the Units
    KnightUnit  
    LavaYetiUnit  
    MageUnit  
    MoveAbleUnit
    The MoveAbleUnit represents the Units that have the ability to move and separates it from the units that cannot.
    Player
    This class represents the Player instances and hold all their attributes along with the necessary methods.
    ScoutUnit  
    SlayerUnit  
    SorceressUnit  
    SpecialMoveAbleUnit
    This class represends the Units that are able to move but also have a Special ability (something extra) they can do
    TrapUnit  
    Unit
    The UNIT class represents the base Units class, but if required unit varietions will extend upon this class according to the needs of the game
